name: A Toxic Flame
description:
A Toxic Flame, is a small game about dealing with a toxic person. 

Controls:

  • WASD to move around. 
  • Enter to talk from afar
  • If you get stuck, take a breath and watch the screen for a sec ;)

Music Credits:

    https://freesound.org/people/plasterbrain/sounds/242855/

    https://freesound.org/people/cabled_mess/sounds/335361/
